meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or situated at a carina.
meanings.sent1: The carinal markings on the shell were distinctive.
meanings.sent2: The carinal position of the bird's nest made it easy to spot.
meanings.sent3: The carinal design on the cake looked like a tiny mountain range.
meanings.sent4: Her carinal focus on details helped her excel in her work.
meanings.sent5: The carinal shape of the leaf made it stand out among the others.

meanings.sent1: The carinal shape of the boat helped it glide smoothly through the water.
meanings.sent2: The carinal edge of the cliff was sharp and dangerous.
meanings.sent3: The carinal pattern on the fabric looked like tiny waves.
meanings.sent4: His carinal determination to finish the race kept him going.
meanings.sent5: The carinal outline of the mountain was visible against the sky.

meanings.sent1: The ship's carinal provided stability in rough seas.
meanings.sent2: The carinal of the mountain range was visible from afar.
meanings.sent3: The carinal of the bookshelf kept the books neatly in place.
meanings.sent4: The carinal of the roof directed rainwater away from the house.
meanings.sent5: The carinal of the canyon created a natural pathway for hikers.
